name: The Gravedigger
description:
*** NEW 1.1.1 VERSION WITH LOW, LOW PRICE! ***

Finally an RTS — real-time strategy — game where you control an army of zombies or humans!

Create your strategies to destroy the opposing team. Use your resources to upgrade your units to stronger and more powerful minions. Don't let your enemy grab the power-ups before you!

Features:

* Two exclusive teams with different units and upgrades.
* Unique experience everytime you play with dynamically generated maps.
* You create and decide your own strategies.
* Innovative zoom-in and out replaces the old fashioned minimap.
* Play through 28 challenging levels in campaign mode.
* Skirmish mode for an intense experience.
* Survival endless mode for your blood lust!
* Distinct soundtrack to increase the game mood.

Upcoming features!

* Exciting new levels!
* Awesome Multiplayer mode on local network.
* Lite version.

Gameplay trailer available at http://www.thegravediggergame.com
developers: Behold Studios Jogos Eletronicos LTDA ME
publishers: Behold Studios Jogos Eletronicos LTDA ME
